title: I can't Connect to the online chat
body: I can log on but i can't get to play games because of how it won't connect me to the online chat service. SOMEBODY HELP ME PLEASE!!!!!1

replies.body:
Since the Chat service is on a different server locale than the login and game servers, your connection could be dropping before reaching the chat servers specifically. I strongly recommend going through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I'm having the same problem.

I tried what was recommended here (2nd last comment), no change: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/XbtWxfhp-cant-connect-to-chat-at-login
Having the same problem. Everything else in the client is working just fine. Seems like they are being hit again on the servers.
